Reviews.Title: “Ok if paying up to 60E per night otherwise give this place a miss”
Reviews.Author: DalissMelbourne
Reviews.Content: overall hotel average stayed studio suite reception manned dont count tourist info help hand bathroom tiny clean paying studio suite value dont bother suites advertised self catering meant 2 tiny electric hotplates pans provided sooooo bad condition cooking boiled egg impossible locations ok 10 min walk vatican entrance 5 mins buses wil termini train station centre rome colosseum etc walk steep stairs nearest metro station staying bus metro

HotelInfo.Name: Vatican Suites
HotelInfo.Address: Via degli Scipioni, 121 4/C, 00192 Rome, Italy
